resources.string: You are not authorized to use this service. Please login to the system.
Server error. Please try again later.
Temporary error in processing the payment! Please try later.
Download completed. Do you want to start listening?
Payment successfully completed. Do you want to start downloading?
Do you want to start downloading?
Not enough space to download this file. Please free up some space and try again.
Sorry! We are unable to detect your phone number. Please contact Mobitel.
Sorry! We are unable to detect your phone number. Please contact Dialog.
Sorry! We are unable to detect your phone number. Please contact Etisalat.
Sorry! Charging failed. Please check your account.
Are you sure you want to delete book from your device?
You can use add-to-bill option only with mobile data. Please enable mobile data and try again!
This book is already in your library. Do you want to start downloading?
Thank you for sending your review!
Thank you for sending your feedback!
There is no account under \'%1$s\'. Signup with Lisn with your email address to enjoy audiobooks anywhere!
Your account is not activated. An email has been sent to your email address. Please open it and click on the link to activate your Lisn account.
Please log in with your facebook account to access your library.
Password you entered is wrong. Enter the correct password or use \'forgot password\' link to reset the password.
An email has been sent to your email address. Please open it and click on the link to activate your Lisn account.
There is an active account under \'%1$s\'. Please log in with your password or use another email address.
An email has been sent to your email address. Please open it and click on the link to activate your Lisn account.
